title: Nintendo Switch 2 Joy-Con Drift, Leaks, & More News! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.07.25
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Bad news about the Nintendo Switch 2 Joy-Cons, Big Nintendo leaks and headlines, and the Minecraft movie is a raging success.

- Friday, we kick off the Elder Scrolls Online Podcast: A Kinda Funny Gamescast Limited Series!
Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:

- After Gamescast is the Kinda Funny Podcast
